name: Trusting Shadows
description:
[Game will take a couple seconds to load the first time]
Make your way out of the dark and unsettling ruins you've found yourself stuck in. Trust the guidance of the unsettling shadow talking to you from the other side of the wall, or don't. Your life depends on it, as these ruins are full of old traps and other shadows that are hunting for you.

Developers:

Joseph Squires - Code, Design, Writing, Art, Sound

Syvan Novom - Art, Music, Playtesting Coordination

Aaron Gonzales - Code
